articles.title: Watch: European Space Agency posts timelapse video of Earth on the first day of 2024 - Scroll.in
articles.description: The footage was captured by astronaut Andreas Mogensen.
articles.content:
What is in store for your 2024?
From the International Space Station and all of us here at Johnson Space Center, we wish you a Happy New Year! pic.twitter.com/xY2q4LseWM
— NASA's Johnson Space Cent… [+33 chars]
